items.title: The Playbook: Lineup locks, Shadow Reports for Week 12
items.description: An all-encompassing look at matchups to exploit or avoid and lineup locks in fantasy, as well as projected scores.

items.title: Last-minute pickups for Week 12: Target the Brissett-Wilson combo in Arizona
items.description: If bye weeks or injuries have you seeking lineup help, consider the Cardinals passing game and a sneaky defense.

items.title: Our guide to every Week 12 NFL game: Matchup previews, predictions, picks and nuggets
items.description: Another Eagles vs. Cowboys classic? McCaffrey vs. the Panthers? Picks, predictions and stats for every Week 12 game.

items.title: How Baker Mayfield's 'spark' came back after five games with the Rams
items.description: Although Los Angeles won just two of the five games with Mayfield in 2022, he "ignited" the building.

items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United want Scott McTominay back
items.description: Manchester United are considering a move to bring Scott McTominay back to Old Trafford from Napoli. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.
